scripts.prep-db: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.launch: npm run prep-db && webpack -d eval-source-map && babel-node src/server.js
scripts.deps: npm i -D @babel/node @babel/preset-react @babel/preset-env eslint eslint-config-airbnb eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks prettier eslint-config-prettier @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties babel-loader webpack webpack-cli morgan sequelize-cli && npm i express react react-dom react-router-dom dotenv sequelize pg pg-hstore express-session session-file-store axios
